metadata.name: Milky Way
metadata.description:
The photo was taken in Nikko, Japan.
The Milky Way in summer was photographed at a wide-angle range. Nine images were stacked at the same angle of view using an equatorial mount, and then composited to express even the smallest stars in detail.

Photo data
Date taken: July 6, 2021
Size: 4024 x 6048
